matches.explanation: Exact match: Red Team's 'Missing server-side encryption configuration for PHI data, violating HIPAA requirements' on aws_s3_bucket.phi_storage was detected as 'Missing Server-Side Encryption' on aws_s3_bucket.phi_storage
Exact match: Red Team's 'No access logging configured for PHI data access auditing' on aws_s3_bucket.phi_storage was detected as 'Missing Access Logging' on aws_s3_bucket.phi_storage
Exact match: Red Team's 'Bucket ACL allows public read access to PHI data' on aws_s3_bucket_acl.phi_bucket_acl was detected as 'Public Read Access for PHI Bucket' on aws_s3_bucket_acl.phi_bucket_acl
